dict.acceptation: 葬礼，丧礼；〈比喻〉不愉快的事，操心的事，有关系的事；
葬礼的；出殡用的，出殡时的；

sent.orig: Documentary proof for funeral such as death certificate and funeral receipt.
sent.trans: 殓葬证明文件如死亡证及殓葬单据。

sent.orig: He was honored with a huge funeral cortege, with all members present in full funeral regalia.
sent.trans: 他被尊重的放在一个巨大无比的葬礼队伍中，所有随行的人都身着丧服。

sent.orig: A woman went into a funeral home to make arrangements for her husband's funeral.
sent.trans: 一个女人走进一家殡仪馆作出安排，她丈夫的葬礼。

sent.orig: Funeral music has coexisted with the funeral custom since the customs formation.
sent.trans: 摘要江西上饶的丧葬音乐，随着丧葬民俗的形成，就一直伴随着。

sent.orig: The funeral was held Monday afternoon from Reavie Brothers Funeral and interment was in Bethel Cemetery.
sent.trans: 葬礼于星期一下午在雷维兄弟殡仪馆举行，然后埋葬在圣地墓地中。
